thread.title: John Goodman shows off weight loss on red carpet
thread.title_full: John Goodman shows off weight loss on red carpet

title: John Goodman shows off weight loss on red carpet
text:
John Goodman shows off weight loss on red carpet 63-year-old actor attends London premiere of 'Trumbo' UPDATED 8:15 PM CDT Oct 09, 2015 Valerie Macon/Getty Images, John Phillips/Getty Images for BFI Photos Valerie Macon/Getty Images, John Phillips/Getty Images for BFI John Goodman took to the red carpet in London on Thursday to promote his new movie while also showing off his newly slimmed-down look. Where are 'Roseanne' stars today? 
Two decades ago, audiences got to know Laurie Metcalf as "Roseanne's" Jackie Harris, a role that won her three Emmys. In honor of her 60th birthday Tuesday, click on to see what she and the rest of her co-stars are up to today. More Goodman's appearance at the British premiere of "Trumbo" at the BFI London Film Festival was just the latest glimpse of his recent weight loss. He showed off a similar svelte look at the movie's premiere at the Toronto Film Festival last month (as seen in the image below). 
The 63-year-old actor best known for the sitcom "Roseanne" as well as movie roles in "Monsters, Inc.," "The Big Lebowski" and "Argo," has seen his weight fluctuate over the years. 
He told David Letterman during a "Late Show" appearance in 2011 that he topped out around 400 pounds at his heaviest after developing an unhealthy eating cycle while on "Roseanne."
